title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about a Pfizer obesity pill, Florida’s failed drug importation plan, and more
description: Pfizer disclosed that an experimental weight loss drug, recently picked up through its acquisition of Metsera, hit its marks in a mid-stage study
content: Pfizer disclosed that an experimental weight loss drug, recently picked up through its acquisition of Metsera, hit its marks in a mid-stage study
